statements: SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE location='New York'
SELECT id, location, value FROM AirQualityData WHERE pollutant='CO2' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT location, MAX(value) as max_value FROM AirQualityData GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-06-30'
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM AirQualityData
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE location = 'New York' AND value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, location, pollutant FROM AirQualityData WHERE pollutant = 'PM2.5' ORDER BY value ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT location, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM AirQualityData GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(value) > 30
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY location, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT pollutant, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM AirQualityData GROUP BY pollutant HAVING COUNT(*) > 50
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT location, reading_time FROM AirQualityData WHERE pollution_level <= 30;
SELECT sensor_id, location, reading_time, pollution_level FROM AirQualityData ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT sensor_id, location, reading_time, pollution_level FROM AirQualityData WHERE pollution_level = 0;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM AirQualityData WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution_level, location FROM AirQualityData GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(pollution_level) > 30 ORDER BY avg_pollution_level DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, reading_time, pollution_level FROM AirQualityData WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) AND pollution_level < 30 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, reading_time DESC;

SELECT location, MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level, MIN(pollution_level) AS min_pollution_level FROM AirQualityData GROUP BY location HAVING MAX(pollution_level) - MIN(pollution_level) > 10 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE pm25 > 50
SELECT location, pm10 FROM AirQualityData WHERE pm10 < 20 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM PollutionSources WHERE source_type = 'Industrial'
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE location = 'City A' AND pm25 < 30
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM PollutionControlMeasures
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE pm25 > 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, pm25 FROM AirQualityData WHERE location='New York' AND pm25 >= 10;
SELECT timestamp, location, pm10 FROM AirQualityData ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM PollutionSources WHERE source_type='Industrial' ORDER BY source_name;
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM PollutionControlMeasures WHERE measure_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT sensor_id, location, reading FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant_type = 'PM2.5';
SELECT location, timestamp FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_population WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_calibration WHERE calibration_factor > 1.0;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, location, pollutant_type FROM air_quality_data WHERE location LIKE 'New%' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(reading) AS avg_reading, pollutant_type FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY pollutant_type;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_population WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY population ASC;
SELECT measure_name, LEFT(description, 50) AS short_description FROM pollution_control_measures WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM devices ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT city, country FROM locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT measure_name, description FROM pollution_control_measures;
SELECT * FROM devices JOIN locations ON devices.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT device_name, city, country FROM devices JOIN locations ON devices.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE devices.device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, installation_date, city, country FROM devices JOIN locations ON devices.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE devices.device_id = 2;

SELECT sensors.sensor_id, sensors.sensor_type, air_quality_measurements.pm25_level, air_quality_measurements.pm10_level FROM sensors JOIN air_quality_measurements ON sensors.sensor_id = air_quality_measurements.sensor_id;
SELECT measure_name, description, city FROM pollution_control_measures JOIN locations ON pollution_control_measures.measure_id = locations.location_id WHERE pollution_control_measures.measure_id = 1;
